archimate:BusinessActor.name: Offentlig Administration
archimate:BusinessActor.documentation:
A state, regional or local authority governed by public law or an association formed by one or several such authorities or a private entity mandated by at least one of those authorities or associations to provide public services, when acting under such a mandate.
Source: eIDAS regulation http://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/?uri=uriserv%3AOJ.L_.2014.257.01.0073.01.ENG

properties.value:
